abstract: K+S, one of the largest European producers of fertilizer ingredient potash, fell as much as 5 percent on Tuesday after The Daily Telegraph reported that it may bid for Compass Minerals International, Bloomberg News reports.
lead_paragraph: K+S, one of the largest European producers of fertilizer ingredient potash, fell as much as 5 percent on Tuesday after The Daily Telegraph reported that it may bid for Compass Minerals International, Bloomberg News reports.

headline.main: K+S Is Said to Consider Bid for Compass Minerals
